edu.ncsu.dre.exception
Class DREUnsupportedOperationException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.lang.RuntimeException
              edu.ncsu.dre.exception.InternationalizedRuntimeException
                  edu.ncsu.dre.exception.DRERuntimeException
                      edu.ncsu.dre.exception.DREUnsupportedOperationException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class DREUnsupportedOperationException
extends DRERuntimeException

Thrown to indicate that the requested operation is not supported. This extends RuntimeException and so does not need to be declared in the throws clause of methods.

Author:
Santthosh Babu Selvadurai
See Also:
Serialized Form

DREUnsupportedOperationException

public DREUnsupportedOperationException(java.lang.String aResourceBundleName,
                                        java.lang.String aMessageKey,
                                        java.lang.Object[] aArguments)
Creates a new exception with a the specified message.

Parameters:
aResourceBundleName - the base name of the resource bundle in which the message for this exception is located.
aMessageKey - an identifier that maps to the message for this exception. The message may contain place holders for arguments as defined by the MessageFormat class.
aArguments - The arguments to the message. null may be used if the message has no arguments.
